About Sudoku Settings
Sudoku is a logic based number placement puzzle. Starting with a partially completed 9*9 grid , the objective is to fill the grid so that each row,each column, and each of the 3*3 boxes {also called blocks}contains the digits 1to9 exactly once
Settings... Sudoku settings s Music Playback songs Hints show hints during play
Difficulty Easy Medium Hard
